title: George Washington Birthplace National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Tales from the Farm A look at what's happening around the Heritage Farm at the park! Active Trails Grant 2013 Follow the link above to read more about the great news here at the park regarding funding for trails--both on land and water--by the National Park Foundation in conjunction with the National Park Service. George Washington Birthplace NM now a Passport Cancellation Stamp Location for the Washington-Rochambeau Revolutionary Route National Historic Trail December 31, 2012 George Washington Birthplace NM now a Passport Cancellation Stamp Location for Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail December 31, 2012 George Washington Birthplace National Monument was featured on EnergyNOW! as part of their Summertime Sustainability segments in early July...check out the video below:  http://www.energynow.com/video/2011/06/29/preview-george-washingtons-geothermal-upgrade International Volunteer at George Washington Birthplace National Monument December 28, 2009 *For Flash File click here A Washington Family Christmas December 26, 2009 George Washington Birthplace NM is now a Passport Stamp Location for the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail December 2, 2009 World Ranger Day Celebrated at George Washington's Birthplace July 30, 2009 Virginia Early Love for Birthplace's New Leader April 28, 2009 Lucy Lawliss is Named Superintendent June 3,2008 Celebrate George Washington February 19, 2007
